featured.text: Firstborns, under normal circumstances, are usually the most strongly motivated toward achievement.

definition.zh_def: 第一個出生的孩子，通常指家庭中的長子或長女。
definition.en_def: The first child born to a set of parents, often referred to as the eldest son or daughter.
definition.example: As the firstborn, she felt a sense of responsibility to set a good example for her younger siblings.
